doctor.name: Dr. Md. Nowshad Ali
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MS (Pediatric Surgery), PESI (India), JICA Fellow (Japan)
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Nowshad Ali is a Pediatric Surgeon in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MS (Pediatric Surgery), PESI (India), JICA Fellow (Japan). He is the Principal of Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Nowshad Ali at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 4pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Syed Sirajul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Syed Sirajul Islam is a Pediatric Surgeon in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery), FRSH (UK), PhD (Fellow). He is working as a Pediatric Surgeon doctor in Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Rajshahi Royal Hospital Pvt. Ltd.. Practicing hour of Dr. Syed Sirajul Islam at Rajshahi Royal Hospital Pvt. Ltd. is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
